billhistory.disclaimer: The Texas Legislative Council makes no representation as to the completeness, timeliness, or accuracy of this data and makes no warranty in regard to its use.
billhistory.caption: Relating to the creation of the Prairie Ridge Municipal Management District No. 1; providing authority to issue bonds; providing authority to impose assessments, fees, or taxes; granting a limited power of eminent domain.

subjects.subject: PRAIRIE RIDGE MUNICIPAL MANAGEMENT DISTRICT NO. 1 (D1451)
Special Districts & Authorities--Miscellaneous (I0770)
MUNICIPAL MANAGEMENT DISTRICTS (S0653)
